title: Funnel Builder
job_overview:
We are seeking an experienced Funnel Builder with specific expertise in the Funnelish platform to design, optimize, and scale high-converting sales funnels. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of building successful funnels within Funnelish and a deep understanding of its features and capabilities.

Key Responsibilities:
Design and build high-converting sales funnels using Funnelish
Optimize existing funnels for improved performance and conversions
Implement and troubleshoot integrations (payment gateways, CRM, email automation)
Conduct A/B testing to refine funnel elements and maximize results
Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to align funnels with business goals

Requirements:
Strong understanding of funnel strategy, UX best practices, and conversion optimization
Proficiency with Funnelish's native tools and features
Detail-oriented with strong problem-solving skills
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

How to Apply:
Interested candidates must complete the following steps:

Fill out the Google Form linked below
Include a link to your portfolio or relevant work samples

Application Form: Upgrade to see actual info

Note: Incomplete applications or submissions without Funnelish examples will not be considered.
